summary:
this mod add a new standalone weapon to skyrim called (Deadly RuneWarAxe)
(forge- and improvable)
descriptionHtml:
hi nexus,
this is another weapon that I\'ve created myself. it was originally used to test gloweffects and original vanilla-designed objects. that is the reason why she has the glow of the hammer Volendrung and a few parts of a skeleton. the death was more a joke XD
she was only tinkered fast but now looks good enough to share her.

{Mod Description}

with this axe will follow you the death! ^^ word literally

the weapon name is (Deadly RuneWarAxe)
it is a standalone 1 hand War-Axe she is forgeable and improvable
stats are the same like daedric

mats (forge)

6 x Coal
2 x Firewood
3 x Steel-ingot
2 x Iron-Ingot
1 x Dwarven-Ingot

mats (improve)

2 x Coal
2 x Steel-Ingot

credits and thanks to Betheda for the Nif-files and for the textures
(i used the vanilla txtures for the skeleton parts)

-------------------------------------------------<===============>------------------------------------------------

make whatever you want with the weapon


So have fun with the game and the mod
author: tesfan123
